front.title: •Owen Lars
front.gametext: Deploys free at Lars' Moisture Farm. Power +2 if at same site as Beru Lars or a Vaporator. If lost from table during opponent's turn, Luke is power +3 until the end of your next turn.
front.lore: Guardian of Luke Skywalker. Husband of Beru Lars. Brother of Obi- Wan Kenobi. Farmer of moisture. Disapprover of Luke's desire to leave Tatooine.
